metadata.description: Growing up in a single parent household with an abusive father, Sora always took comfort in knowing that his best friend and neighbor Tetsuya is always there for him. Their relationship has always been a close one, but when they realize they're beginning to develop feelings for each other beyond the boundaries of "best friends", Tetsuya starts to avoid Sora all together. Will they be able to regain the comfortable friendship they once shared? Or will it all fall apart?-------Translated by Neri Wesek; Edited by Chris Chiwon Woo; Lettered by Courtny Fenrich
metadata.name: A Night Of A Thousand Nights
